title: Paneer Butter Masala
description: A rich and creamy North Indian vegetarian dish made with paneer cubes in a spicy tomato-based gravy.

title: Masala Dosa
description: A South Indian vegetarian dish consisting of a crispy rice crepe filled with spiced potato filling.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A popular North Indian non-veg dish where grilled chicken is served in a spiced tomato and cream sauce.

title: Chettinad Chicken Curry
description: A fiery and flavorful South Indian non-veg dish from Tamil Nadu, made with a blend of spices and chicken.

title: Aloo Gobi
description: A North Indian vegetarian dish made with potatoes and cauliflower in a spiced curry.

title: Vegetable Biryani
description: A flavorful and aromatic South Indian vegetarian rice dish cooked with a variety of vegetables and spices.

title: Rogan Josh
description: A classic North Indian non-veg dish made with tender pieces of lamb cooked in a rich, spicy sauce.

title: Mutton Curry
description: A traditional South Indian non-veg dish made with mutton simmered in a flavorful curry with spices.

title: Dal Makhani
description: A creamy and rich North Indian vegetarian dish made from black lentils and red kidney beans.

title: Sambar
description: A South Indian vegetarian lentil-based stew cooked with vegetables and spices, served with rice or idli.

title: Butter Chicken
description: A rich and creamy North Indian non-veg dish made with tender chicken cooked in a spiced tomato gravy.

title: Fish Curry
description: A tangy and spicy South Indian non-veg dish made with fish cooked in a tamarind-based curry.

title: Baingan Bharta
description: A smoky-flavored North Indian vegetarian dish made with roasted eggplant cooked with spices.

title: Avial
description: A traditional South Indian vegetarian dish made with a variety of vegetables cooked in coconut and yogurt.

title: Tandoori Chicken
description: A North Indian non-veg dish made with marinated chicken cooked in a clay oven for a smoky flavor.

title: Egg Curry
description: A simple and flavorful South Indian non-veg dish made with boiled eggs cooked in a spicy curry.

title: Rajma
description: A popular North Indian vegetarian dish made with kidney beans in a thick gravy, served with rice.

title: Appam with Stew
description: A traditional South Indian vegetarian dish consisting of soft, spongy appams served with vegetable stew.

title: Goat Curry
description: A North Indian non-veg dish made with tender goat meat cooked in a rich, spiced gravy.

title: Keralan Fish Fry
description: A crispy and flavorful South Indian non-veg dish made with fish marinated in spices and fried to perfection.
